")

Bash(uv run python -c "
# Test the GitHub tools functionality
from src.backend.mcp_server.github_tools import GitHubMCPTools

# Create a GitHub tools instance
github_tools = GitHubMCPTools\(\)

# Print available methods
print\(''Available GitHub Methods:''\)
methods = [method for method in dir\(github_tools\) if not method.startswith\(''_''\) and callable\(getattr\(github_tools, method\)\)]
for method in methods:
    print\(f''  - {method}''\)

print\(''''\)
print\(''GitHub MCP Tools initialized successfully!''\)
print\(''Environment variables status:''\)
print\(f''  - GITHUB_TOKEN: {""SET"" if github_tools.github_token else ""NOT SET""}''\)
print\(f''  - GITHUB_OWNER: {""SET"" if github_tools.github_owner else ""NOT SET""}''\)  
print\(f''  - GITHUB_REPO: {""SET"" if github_tools.github_repo else ""NOT SET""}''\)
")
